org.seedstack.crud.rest

Interface ReadResource<A extends AggregateRoot<I>,I,D>

  • Type Parameters:
    A - the aggregate root type.
    I - the aggregate root identifier type.
    D - the representation type.
    All Superinterfaces:
    Resource<A,I,D>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseCrudResource

    public interface ReadResource<A extends AggregateRoot<I>,I,D>
extends Resource<A,I,D>
    Specialization of Resource for reading aggregates (the R of CRUD).
    See Also:
    CreateResource, ReadResource, UpdateResource, DeleteResource, Resource

    • Method Summary

      The method that implements REST aggregate retrieval.

    • Method Detail

      • applyLimit

        default <S extends Slice<A>> SpecificationPicker<S,A> applyLimit(@BeanParam
                                                                 PaginationParams params,
                                                                 LimitPicker<S,A> limitPicker)
        Apply a pagination limit if present in the given pagination parameters.
        Type Parameters:
        S - the type of the paginated result.
        Parameters:
        params - the pagination parameters.
        limitPicker - the Paginator DSL element to apply the limit to.
        Returns:
        the Paginator DSL element to continue with.

      • get

        @GET
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Path(value="/{id}")
default D get(@PathParam(value="id")
                                                                              I id)
        The method that implements REST aggregate retrieval.
        Parameters:
        id - the identifier of the aggregate to retrieve, passed as /{id} path parameter. If the identifier type is a complex object, it must have a constructor taking a single String parameter.
        Returns:
        the representation of the retrieved aggregate.

      • list

        @GET
 @Produces(value="application/json")
default Object list(@BeanParam
                                                              PaginationParams paginationParams,
                                                              @BeanParam
                                                              SortParams sortParams)
        The method that implements REST aggregate listing. Supports pagination through PaginationParams query parameters.
        Parameters:
        paginationParams - the optional pagination parameters.
        sortParams - the optional sorting parameters.
        Returns:
        the serialized stream of aggregates, enveloped in a pagination wrapper if necessary.
